channel.title: Defcon 18- Pwned by the Owner (Defcon Talk)
channel.description:
Hey mates!
Just wanted to share this awesome DEFCON talk I found, about how a hacker found where his stolen desktop was and completely pwned the person who stole it! It's pretty funny, and I'm sure if you haven't seen it already you will enjoy it a lot!
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U4oB28ksiIo

item.title: Defcon 18- Pwned by the Owner (Defcon Talk)

item.description:
I’ve known this for ages! One of my favourites I encourage everybody to watch this, so decent.

Read full topic
